description: Retrieves an indexer definition from Azure Search.

outputfieldmappings.description: Output field mappings are applied after enrichment and immediately before indexing.

fieldmappings.description: Defines mappings between fields in the data source and corresponding target fields in the index.

datasourcename.description: The name of the datasource from which this indexer reads data.

client_request_id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

disabled.description: A value indicating whether the indexer is disabled. Default is false.

targetindexname.description: The name of the index to which this indexer writes data.

skillsetname.description: The name of the cognitive skillset executing with this indexer.

indexer_name.description: The name of the indexer to retrieve.
